REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires limited profit housing company to show maintenance of essential services before approval of rent increases
Summary: Defines, for purposes of the Mitchell-Lama housing projects, "essential services" which landlords in limited-profit housing companies are obligated to provide and requires that any authorized maximum average monthly rental increase shall be conditioned on the continued maintenance of such defined services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to defining "essential services" and conditioning approval of increase of maximum rentals upon maintenance of all essential services
